com.googlecode.cqengine.engine

Class CollectionQueryEngine<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.cqengine.engine.CollectionQueryEngine<O>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModificationListener<O>, QueryEngine<O>, QueryEngineInternal<O>

    public class CollectionQueryEngine<O>
extends Object
implements QueryEngineInternal<O>
    The main component of CQEngine - maintains a set of indexes on a collection and accepts queries which it performs and optimizes for those indexes.
    Author:
    Niall Gallagher

      Adds the given index to the collection.
      void clear(QueryOptions queryOptions)
      Notifies the listener that all objects have been removed from the collection, and so it can take action and update its internal data structures.

      Returns the set of indexes which were previously added to the collection via the QueryEngine.addIndex(com.googlecode.cqengine.index.Index, QueryOptions) method.

      ResultSet<O> retrieve(Query<O> query, QueryOptions queryOptions)
      Retrieves a ResultSet which provides objects matching the given query, additionally accepting QueryOptions which can specify ordering of results, deduplication strategy etc.

      • addIndex

        public void addIndex(Index<O> index,
                     QueryOptions queryOptions)
        Adds the given index to the collection.

        Subsequently queries passed to the QueryEngine.retrieve(com.googlecode.cqengine.query.Query, QueryOptions) method will use these indexes if suitable for the particular queries, to speed up retrievals.

        Specified by:
        addIndex in interface QueryEngine<O>
        Parameters:
        index - The index to add
        queryOptions - Optional parameters for the index

      • getIndexes

        public Iterable<Index<O>> getIndexes()
        Returns the set of indexes which were previously added to the collection via the QueryEngine.addIndex(com.googlecode.cqengine.index.Index, QueryOptions) method.
        Specified by:
        getIndexes in interface QueryEngine<O>
        Returns:
        The set of which were previously added to the collection via the QueryEngine.addIndex(com.googlecode.cqengine.index.Index, QueryOptions) method

      • retrieve

        public ResultSet<O> retrieve(Query<O> query,
                             QueryOptions queryOptions)
        Retrieves a ResultSet which provides objects matching the given query, additionally accepting QueryOptions which can specify ordering of results, deduplication strategy etc.
        Specified by:
        retrieve in interface QueryEngine<O>
        Parameters:
        query - A query representing some assertions which sought objects must match
        queryOptions - Optional parameters for the query
        Returns:
        A ResultSet which provides objects matching the given query

      • isMutable

        public boolean isMutable()
        Indicates if all indexes maintained by the query engine are mutable. Returns true in the edge case that there are no indexes.
        Specified by:
        isMutable in interface QueryEngineInternal<O>
        Returns:
        True if all indexes are mutable, false if any indexes are not mutable
